humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, the sentinel lymph node (SLN #1, right axilla) was negative for metastases (0/1). Based on the rules provided, N0 indicates no positive lymph nodes or no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the sentinel lymph node (SLN #1, Right Axilla) is negative for metastases (0/1). This indicates that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage is N0.
